summary: Timeline_8 shows someone managing bipolar disorder with medication adjustments and therapeutic support.

posts.text: Feel like I'll never get better. I'm disgusting All this therapy for nothing. I'm spiraling out of control My therapist reminded me how far I've come. called the crisis hotline Looking at my progress journal from six months ago. I'm worth the effort
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Starting to see the light at the end of the tunnel. used my DBT skills Therapy is really helping. I'm worth the effort Still have rough days. I'm broken beyond repair But they're getting less frequent. I don't care about anything anymore
maladaptive_evidence: I don't care about anything anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Haven't left my apartment in days. I'm broken beyond repair I've been having suicidal thoughts Forced myself to go for a walk today tried a new coping mechanism and called my sister. I'm committed to my recovery
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel anxious all the time. I'm worthless and pathetic I haven't showered in a week Started using the coping strategies from therapy. set healthy boundaries I'm trying to be patient with myself. I'm working on self-compassion
maladaptive_evidence: I haven't showered in a week
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The depression is getting worse. I'm worthless and pathetic I'm losing my mind I know I need help so I asked for support My therapist suggested Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feel like I'll never get better. I feel empty inside All this therapy for nothing. I pushed everyone away My therapist reminded me how far I've come. reached out for help Looking at my progress journal from six months ago. I'm not giving up
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feel like I'll never get better. I'm disgusting All this therapy for nothing. I don't care about anything anymore My therapist reminded me how far I've come. tried a new coping mechanism Looking at my progress journal from six months ago. Things can get better
maladaptive_evidence: I don't care about anything anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels impossible. Life is meaningless I'm worthless. I haven't showered in a week Did one small thing today - made my bed. did some self-care activities Trying to celebrate tiny victories. I'm being patient with myself
maladaptive_evidence: I haven't showered in a week
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My partner and I have been fighting constantly. I'm disgusting I feel like I'm ruining everything. I gave up trying We decided to try couples therapy. joined a support group Had our first session and it went better than expected. I'm committed to my recovery
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feel like I'll never get better. I'm worthless and pathetic All this therapy for nothing. I've been drinking to cope My therapist reminded me how far I've come. went for a walk to clear my head Looking at my progress journal from six months ago. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: went for a walk to clear my head
Recovery is a journey, not a destination
